detaileddescription.para: Create() must be called later to effectively create the control.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxWindow *parent, const wxString &message, const wxString &title, const wxArrayInt &order, const wxArrayString &items, const wxPoint &pos=wxDefaultPosition, const wxString &name=wxRearrangeDialogNameStr)
memberdef.name: wxRearrangeDialog

detaileddescription.para: Please see Create() for the parameters description.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxWindow *parent, const wxString &message, const wxString &title, const wxArrayInt &order, const wxArrayString &items, const wxPoint &pos=wxDefaultPosition, const wxString &name=wxRearrangeDialogNameStr)
memberdef.name: Create

briefdescription.para: Effectively creates the dialog for an object created using the default constructor.

parameterdescription.para: The message shown inside the dialog itself, above the items list.
The initial order of the items in the convention used by wxRearrangeList.
The items to show in the dialog.

simplesect.para: true if the dialog was successfully created or false if creation failed.

briefdescription.para: Customize the dialog by adding extra controls to it.

detaileddescription.para: This function adds the given win to the dialog, putting it just below the part occupied by wxRearrangeCtrl. It must be called after creating the dialog and you will typically need to process the events generated by the extra controls for them to do something useful.
See also the complete example of a custom rearrange dialog in the dialogs sample.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the extra controls. It must have this dialog as its parent.

briefdescription.para: Return the list control used by the dialog.
Return the array describing the order of items after it was modified by the user.

detaileddescription.para: Please notice that the array will contain negative items if any items were unchecked. See wxRearrangeList for more information about the convention used for this array.

briefdescription.para: A dialog allowing the user to rearrange the specified items.
